text.autoconfig.mutekey.title: Mutekey settings
text.autoconfig.mutekey.option.showMuteM: Whether or not to display a message when the game gets muted
text.autoconfig.mutekey.option.muteMessa:
Message to display when game gets muted
Using the '%' symbol will insert the saved volume percentage.
text.autoconfig.mutekey.option.showUnmut: Whether or not to display a message when the game gets unmuted
text.autoconfig.mutekey.option.unmuteMes:
Message to display when game gets unmuted
Using the '%' symbol will insert the saved volume percentage.
text.autoconfig.mutekey.option.autoMuteO:
Automatically mute the game when in background
Disabled this when using DynamicFPS
